class.title: Knight
class.description: A knight in shining armor, an individual devoted to law and good.

class.title: Assassin
class.description: The assassin is a mercenary who accomplishes his task coldly, with a completely professional detachment, but he is also a spy, a bounty hunter and a terrorist.

class.title: Barbarian
class.description: A brutal fighter who comes from the frontiers of civilization. Pathfinder unchained offers a revised version that aims to be more balanced for the parties.

class.title: Shaman
class.description: Both a nature-worshiping spellcaster, animal lover, and gifted shapeshifter.
